address.docs:
**, int**: Manually specify the I²C address of the sensor. Defaults to `0x61`.

*See also: [SCD30 CO₂, Temperature and Relative Humidity Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/scd30.html#configuration-variables)*

altitude_compensation.docs:
**, int**: Enable compensating deviations due to current altitude (in metres). Notice: setting *altitude_compensation* is ignored if *ambient_pressure_compensation* is set.

*See also: [SCD30 CO₂, Temperature and Relative Humidity Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/scd30.html#configuration-variables)*

ambient_pressure_compensation.docs:
**, int**: Enable compensation of measured CO₂ values based on given ambient pressure in mBar.

*See also: [SCD30 CO₂, Temperature and Relative Humidity Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/scd30.html#configuration-variables)*

automatic_self_calibration.docs:
**, boolean**: Whether to enable automatic self calibration (ASC). Defaults to `true`.

*See also: [SCD30 CO₂, Temperature and Relative Humidity Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/scd30.html#configuration-variables)*

co2.docs:
The information for the CO₂ sensor.
  * All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [SCD30 CO₂, Temperature and Relative Humidity Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/scd30.html#configuration-variables)*

humidity.docs:
The information for the Humidity sensor.
  * All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [SCD30 CO₂, Temperature and Relative Humidity Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/scd30.html#configuration-variables)*

temperature.docs:
The information for the Temperature sensor.
  * All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [SCD30 CO₂, Temperature and Relative Humidity Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/scd30.html#configuration-variables)*

temperature_offset.docs:
**, float**: Temperature and humidity offsets may occur when operating the sensor in end-customer devices. This variable allows the compensation of those effects by setting a temperature offset.

*See also: [SCD30 CO₂, Temperature and Relative Humidity Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/scd30.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**, [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Available range: [2 … 1800]. Defaults to `60s`.

*See also: [SCD30 CO₂, Temperature and Relative Humidity Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/scd30.html#configuration-variables)*
